gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 119, Pistons 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Pistons, 119-108. DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Bulls with 29 points (11-19 FG), while Nikola Vucevic added 21 points and 12 rebounds in the victory. Kevin Knox II tallied a team-high 18 points and 4 3PM for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 4-6 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-9.
